entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 11 March 2023
